EstablishmentCollection.RightToReply:
<p>
	Immediately after the inspection, improvements were made to our dating of food items and the recording of allergens.&nbsp; New processes were implemented and staff were retrained.&nbsp; Some specific recommendations were implemented on the same day,&nbsp; all others will be implemented over winter when the Caf&eacute; is closed.</p>
